original_title: Linkin Park: Live From Madison Square Garden
overview: Linkin Parkâ€™s February 4, 2011 concert from Madison Square Garden which aired on Fuse on February 18 2011. The highly anticipated broadcast featured fan favorites along with songs from their latest album, A Thousand Suns. The show has limited commercial interruptions thanks to Coca-Cola.
title: Linkin Park: Live From Madison Square Garden
